00025 BOOLEAN gfLoadingExitGrids = FALSE;
00026 
00027 //used by editor.
00028 EXITGRID          gExitGrid   = {0,1,1,0};
00029 
00030 BOOLEAN gfOverrideInsertionWithExitGrid = FALSE;
00031 
00032 INT32 ConvertExitGridToINT32( EXITGRID *pExitGrid )
00033 {
00034       INT32 iExitGridInfo;
00035       iExitGridInfo  = (pExitGrid->ubGotoSectorX-1)<< 28;
00036       iExitGridInfo += (pExitGrid->ubGotoSectorY-1)<< 24;
00037       iExitGridInfo += pExitGrid->ubGotoSectorZ    << 20;
00038       iExitGridInfo += pExitGrid->usGridNo & 0x0000ffff;
00039       return iExitGridInfo;
00040 }
00041 
00042 void ConvertINT32ToExitGrid( INT32 iExitGridInfo, EXITGRID *pExitGrid )
00043 {
00044       //convert the int into 4 unsigned bytes.
00045       pExitGrid->ubGotoSectorX            = (UINT8)(((iExitGridInfo & 0xf0000000)>>28)+1);
00046       pExitGrid->ubGotoSectorY            = (UINT8)(((iExitGridInfo & 0x0f000000)>>24)+1);
00047       pExitGrid->ubGotoSectorZ            = (UINT8)((iExitGridInfo & 0x00f00000)>>20);
00048       pExitGrid->usGridNo                             = (UINT16)(iExitGridInfo & 0x0000ffff);
00049 }
00050 
00051 BOOLEAN     GetExitGrid( UINT16 usMapIndex, EXITGRID *pExitGrid )
00052 {
00053       LEVELNODE *pShadow;
00054       pShadow = gpWorldLevelData[ usMapIndex ].pShadowHead;
00055       //Search through object layer for an exitgrid
00056       while( pShadow )
00057       {
00058             if ( pShadow->uiFlags & LEVELNODE_EXITGRID )
00059             {
00060                   ConvertINT32ToExitGrid( pShadow->iExitGridInfo, pExitGrid );
00061                   return TRUE;
00062             }
00063             pShadow = pShadow->pNext;
00064       }
00065       pExitGrid->ubGotoSectorX = 0;
00066       pExitGrid->ubGotoSectorY = 0;
00067       pExitGrid->ubGotoSectorZ = 0;
00068       pExitGrid->usGridNo = 0;
00069       return FALSE;     
00070 }
00071 
00072 BOOLEAN     ExitGridAtGridNo( UINT16 usMapIndex )
00073 {
00074       LEVELNODE *pShadow;
00075       pShadow = gpWorldLevelData[ usMapIndex ].pShadowHead;
00076       //Search through object layer for an exitgrid
00077       while( pShadow )
00078       {
00079             if ( pShadow->uiFlags & LEVELNODE_EXITGRID )
00080             {
00081                   return TRUE;
00082             }
00083             pShadow = pShadow->pNext;
00084       }
00085       return FALSE;     
00086 }
00087 
00088 BOOLEAN     GetExitGridLevelNode( UINT16 usMapIndex, LEVELNODE **ppLevelNode )
00089 {
00090       LEVELNODE *pShadow;
00091       pShadow = gpWorldLevelData[ usMapIndex ].pShadowHead;
00092       //Search through object layer for an exitgrid
00093       while( pShadow )
00094       {
00095             if ( pShadow->uiFlags & LEVELNODE_EXITGRID )
00096             {
00097                   *ppLevelNode = pShadow;
00098                   return TRUE;
00099             }
00100             pShadow = pShadow->pNext;
00101       }
00102       return FALSE;     
00103 }

00106 void AddExitGridToWorld( INT32 iMapIndex, EXITGRID *pExitGrid )
00107 {
00108       LEVELNODE *pShadow, *tail;
00109       pShadow = gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].pShadowHead;
00110 
00111       //Search through object layer for an exitgrid
00112       while( pShadow )
00113       {
00114             tail = pShadow;
00115             if( pShadow->uiFlags & LEVELNODE_EXITGRID )
00116             { //we have found an existing exitgrid in this node, so replace it with the new information.
00117                   pShadow->iExitGridInfo = ConvertExitGridToINT32( pExitGrid );
00118                   //SmoothExitGridRadius( (UINT16)iMapIndex, 0 );
00119                   return;
00120             }
00121             pShadow = pShadow->pNext;
00122       }
00123 
00124       // Add levelnode
00125       AddShadowToHead( iMapIndex, MOCKFLOOR1 );
00126       // Get new node
00127       pShadow = gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].pShadowHead;
00128 
00129       //fill in the information for the new exitgrid levelnode.
00130       pShadow->iExitGridInfo = ConvertExitGridToINT32( pExitGrid );
00131       pShadow->uiFlags |= ( LEVELNODE_EXITGRID | LEVELNODE_HIDDEN );
00132 
00133       //Add the exit grid to the sector, only if we call ApplyMapChangesToMapTempFile() first.
00134       if( !gfEditMode && !gfLoadingExitGrids )
00135       {
00136             AddExitGridToMapTempFile( (UINT16)iMapIndex, pExitGrid, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
00137       }
00138 }
00139 
00140 void RemoveExitGridFromWorld( INT32 iMapIndex )
00141 {
00142       UINT16 usDummy;
00143       if( TypeExistsInShadowLayer( iMapIndex, MOCKFLOOR, &usDummy ) )
00144       {
00145             RemoveAllShadowsOfTypeRange( iMapIndex, MOCKFLOOR, MOCKFLOOR );
00146       }
00147 }
00148 
00149 void SaveExitGrids( HWFILE fp, UINT16 usNumExitGrids )
00150 {
00151       EXITGRID exitGrid;
00152       UINT16 usNumSaved = 0;
00153       UINT16 x;
00154       UINT32      uiBytesWritten;
00155       FileWrite( fp, &usNumExitGrids, 2, &uiBytesWritten );
00156       for( x = 0; x < WORLD_MAX; x++ )
00157       {
00158             if( GetExitGrid( x, &exitGrid ) )
00159             {
00160                   FileWrite( fp, &x, 2, &uiBytesWritten );
00161                   FileWrite( fp, &exitGrid, 5, &uiBytesWritten );
00162                   usNumSaved++;
00163             }
00164       }
00165       //If these numbers aren't equal, something is wrong!
00166       Assert( usNumExitGrids == usNumSaved );
00167 }
00168 
00169 void LoadExitGrids( INT8 **hBuffer )
00170 {
00171       EXITGRID exitGrid;
00172       UINT16 x;
00173       UINT16 usNumSaved;
00174       UINT16 usMapIndex;
00175       gfLoadingExitGrids = TRUE;
00176       LOADDATA( &usNumSaved, *hBuffer, 2 );
00177       //FileRead( hfile, &usNumSaved, 2, NULL);
00178       for( x = 0; x < usNumSaved; x++ )
00179       {
00180             LOADDATA( &usMapIndex, *hBuffer, 2 );
00181             //FileRead( hfile, &usMapIndex, 2, NULL);
00182             LOADDATA( &exitGrid, *hBuffer, 5 );
00183             //FileRead( hfile, &exitGrid, 5, NULL);
00184             AddExitGridToWorld( usMapIndex, &exitGrid );
00185       }
00186       gfLoadingExitGrids = FALSE;
00187 }
00188 
00189 void AttemptToChangeFloorLevel( INT8 bRelativeZLevel )
00190 {
00191       UINT8 ubLookForLevel=0;
00192       UINT16 i;
00193       if( bRelativeZLevel != 1 && bRelativeZLevel != -1 )
00194             return;
00195       //Check if on ground level -- if so, can't go up!
00196       if( bRelativeZLevel == -1 && !gbWorldSectorZ )
00197       {
00198             ScreenMsg( FONT_DKYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, pMessageStrings[ MSG_CANT_GO_UP ], ubLookForLevel );
00199             return;
00200       }
00201       //Check if on bottom level -- if so, can't go down!
00202       if( bRelativeZLevel == 1 && gbWorldSectorZ == 3 )
00203       {
00204 
00205             ScreenMsg( FONT_DKYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, pMessageStrings[ MSG_CANT_GO_DOWN ], ubLookForLevel );
00206             return;
00207       }
00208       ubLookForLevel = (UINT8)(gbWorldSectorZ + bRelativeZLevel);
00209       for( i = 0; i < WORLD_MAX; i++ )
00210       {
00211             if( GetExitGrid( i, &gExitGrid ) )
00212             {
00213                   if( gExitGrid.ubGotoSectorZ == ubLookForLevel )
00214                   { //found an exit grid leading to the goal sector!
00215                         gfOverrideInsertionWithExitGrid = TRUE;
00216                         //change all current mercs in the loaded sector, and move them
00217                         //to the new sector.
00218                         MoveAllGroupsInCurrentSectorToSector( (UINT8)gWorldSectorX, (UINT8)gWorldSectorY, ubLookForLevel );
00219                         if( ubLookForLevel )
00220                               ScreenMsg( FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, pMessageStrings[ MSG_ENTERING_LEVEL ], ubLookForLevel );
00221                         else
00222                               ScreenMsg( FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, pMessageStrings[ MSG_LEAVING_BASEMENT ] );
00223 
00224                         SetCurrentWorldSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, ubLookForLevel );
00225                         gfOverrideInsertionWithExitGrid = FALSE;
00226                   }
00227             }
00228       }
00229 }

00231 
00232 UINT16 FindGridNoFromSweetSpotCloseToExitGrid( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sSweetGridNo, INT8 ubRadius, UINT8 *pubDirection )
00233 {
00234       INT16  sTop, sBottom;
00235       INT16  sLeft, sRight;
00236       INT16  cnt1, cnt2;
00237       INT16       sGridNo;
00238       INT32       uiRange, uiLowestRange = 999999;
00239       INT16       sLowestGridNo=0;
00240       INT32                         leftmost;
00241       BOOLEAN     fFound = FALSE;
00242       SOLDIERTYPE soldier;
00243       UINT8 ubSaveNPCAPBudget;
00244       UINT8 ubSaveNPCDistLimit;
00245       EXITGRID    ExitGrid;
00246       UINT8 ubGotoSectorX, ubGotoSectorY, ubGotoSectorZ;
00247 
00248       // Turn off at end of function...
00249       gfPlotPathToExitGrid = TRUE;
00250 
00251       //Save AI pathing vars.  changing the distlimit restricts how 
00252       //far away the pathing will consider.
00253       ubSaveNPCAPBudget = gubNPCAPBudget;
00254       ubSaveNPCDistLimit = gubNPCDistLimit;
00255       gubNPCAPBudget = 0;
00256       gubNPCDistLimit = ubRadius;
00257 
00258       //create dummy soldier, and use the pathing to determine which nearby slots are
00259       //reachable.
00260       memset( &soldier, 0, sizeof( SOLDIERTYPE ) );
00261       soldier.bLevel = 0;
00262       soldier.bTeam = 1;
00263       soldier.sGridNo = pSoldier->sGridNo;
00264 
00265       // OK, Get an exit grid ( if possible )
00266   if ( !GetExitGrid( sSweetGridNo, &ExitGrid ) )
00267       {
00268             return( NOWHERE );
00269       }
00270 
00271       // Copy our dest values.....
00272       ubGotoSectorX = ExitGrid.ubGotoSectorX;
00273       ubGotoSectorY = ExitGrid.ubGotoSectorY;
00274       ubGotoSectorZ = ExitGrid.ubGotoSectorZ;
00275 
00276 
00277       sTop        = ubRadius;
00278       sBottom = -ubRadius;
00279       sLeft   = - ubRadius;
00280       sRight  = ubRadius;
00281 
00282       //clear the mapelements of potential residue MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE flags
00283       //in the square region.
00284       for( cnt1 = sBottom; cnt1 <= sTop; cnt1++ )
00285       {
00286             for( cnt2 = sLeft; cnt2 <= sRight; cnt2++ )
00287             {
00288                   sGridNo = pSoldier->sGridNo + (WORLD_COLS * cnt1) + cnt2;
00289                   if ( sGridNo >= 0 && sGridNo < WORLD_MAX )
00290                   {
00291                         gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags &= (~MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE);
00292                   }
00293             }
00294       }
00295 
00296       //Now, find out which of these gridnos are reachable 
00297       //(use the fake soldier and the pathing settings)
00298       FindBestPath( &soldier, NOWHERE, 0, WALKING, COPYREACHABLE, PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE );
00299       
00300       uiLowestRange = 999999; 
00301 
00302       for( cnt1 = sBottom; cnt1 <= sTop; cnt1++ )
00303       {
00304             leftmost = ( ( pSoldier->sGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) )/ WORLD_COLS ) * WORLD_COLS;
00305 
00306             for( cnt2 = sLeft; cnt2 <= sRight; cnt2++ )
00307             {
00308                   sGridNo = pSoldier->sGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) + cnt2;
00309                   if ( sGridNo >=0 && sGridNo < WORLD_MAX && sGridNo >= leftmost && sGridNo < ( leftmost + WORLD_COLS ) && 
00310                         gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE )
00311                   {
00312                         // Go on sweet stop
00313                         // ATE: Added this check because for all intensive purposes, cavewalls will be not an OKDEST
00314                         // but we want thenm too...
00315                         if ( NewOKDestination( pSoldier, sGridNo, TRUE, pSoldier->bLevel ) )
00316                         {
00317                               if ( GetExitGrid( sGridNo, &ExitGrid ) )
00318                               {
00319                                     // Is it the same exitgrid?
00320                                     if ( ExitGrid.ubGotoSectorX == ubGotoSectorX && ExitGrid.ubGotoSectorY == ubGotoSectorY && ExitGrid.ubGotoSectorZ == ubGotoSectorZ )
00321                                     {
00322                                           uiRange = GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( pSoldier->sGridNo, sGridNo );
00323 
00324                                           if ( uiRange < uiLowestRange )
00325                                           {
00326                                                 sLowestGridNo = sGridNo;
00327                                                 uiLowestRange = uiRange;
00328                                                 fFound = TRUE;
00329                                           }
00330                                     }
00331                               }
00332                         }
00333                   }
00334             }
00335       }
00336       gubNPCAPBudget = ubSaveNPCAPBudget;
00337       gubNPCDistLimit = ubSaveNPCDistLimit;
00338 
00339       gfPlotPathToExitGrid = FALSE;
00340 
00341       if ( fFound )
00342       {
00343             // Set direction to center of map!
00344             *pubDirection =  (UINT8)GetDirectionToGridNoFromGridNo( sLowestGridNo, ( ( ( WORLD_ROWS / 2 ) * WORLD_COLS ) + ( WORLD_COLS / 2 ) ) );
00345             return( sLowestGridNo );
00346       }
00347       else
00348       {
00349             return( NOWHERE );
00350       }
00351 }

00354 UINT16 FindClosestExitGrid( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sSrcGridNo, INT8 ubRadius )
00355 {
00356       INT16  sTop, sBottom;
00357       INT16  sLeft, sRight;
00358       INT16  cnt1, cnt2;
00359       INT16       sGridNo;
00360       INT32       uiRange, uiLowestRange = 999999;
00361       INT16       sLowestGridNo=0;
00362       INT32                         leftmost;
00363       BOOLEAN     fFound = FALSE;
00364       EXITGRID    ExitGrid;
00365 
00366 
00367       sTop        = ubRadius;
00368       sBottom = -ubRadius;
00369       sLeft   = - ubRadius;
00370       sRight  = ubRadius;
00371 
00372       //clear the mapelements of potential residue MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE flags
00373       uiLowestRange = 999999; 
00374 
00375       for( cnt1 = sBottom; cnt1 <= sTop; cnt1++ )
00376       {
00377             leftmost = ( ( sSrcGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) )/ WORLD_COLS ) * WORLD_COLS;
00378 
00379             for( cnt2 = sLeft; cnt2 <= sRight; cnt2++ )
00380             {
00381                   sGridNo = sSrcGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * cnt1 ) + cnt2;
00382                   if( sGridNo >=0 && sGridNo < WORLD_MAX && sGridNo >= leftmost && sGridNo < ( leftmost + WORLD_COLS ) )
00383                   {
00384                         if ( GetExitGrid( sGridNo, &ExitGrid ) )
00385                         {
00386                               uiRange = GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( sSrcGridNo, sGridNo );
00387 
00388                               if ( uiRange < uiLowestRange )
00389                               {
00390                                     sLowestGridNo = sGridNo;
00391                                     uiLowestRange = uiRange;
00392                                     fFound = TRUE;
00393                               }
00394                         }
00395                   }
00396             }
00397       }
00398 
00399       if ( fFound )
00400       {
00401             return( sLowestGridNo );
00402       }
00403       else
00404       {
00405             return( NOWHERE );
00406       }
00407 }
